Balloons ...where the event begins

About Circleshade

Balloons Decorations and Design For All Occasions & Events

At Circleshade we cater for all events and special occasions. If you have an idea, we can help you bring your vision to life! Or if you need inspiration, our team can assist in creating unique balloon decorations specific to your theme and event. Our services range from complete decorations for an event to personalised balloon gifts. Be it for birthdays, shop openings, new born, mother’s day, father’s day, valentine’s day, baptisms, get well soon, new year, Christmas, weddings or engagements, Circleshade can meet all your needs!

Fast Delivery

We are based in Jounieh Ghadir, please contact us for more information about delivery.

Fast Work

If you find yourself in need of a last-minute gift or decoration, we can provide.

Creative

We create unique hand-crafted designs to suit any theme or event.

Good Price

Our balloons will liven any event and add a special touch to any gift at affordable prices.
